title: Can't log in
body: It authorizes the account information but it takes 20 seconds to load in and at the end it brings up an error, Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server. This is happening for all of my accounts but discord is working.

replies.body: The server went down for maintenance, and everything is coming back online now.  Please let me know if you are still having issues logging in!
Still cant login, it sits at logging in for about 20 secs then fails to login, it seems century link users are having issues all over the place, Kansas here
I agree with him, I seem to try everything that was suggested on there, please help

i have same problem. i was playing ranked game and boom disconnected. i checked my internet connection and it was fine. cant reconnect right now and nothing mentioned above worked. just got 9 reports by the way im sure of it
This error is continuing for me in spite of the server being back up.

Thanks for the update!  Your specific issue may be due to a network problem connecting to the servers.  Go over the[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and get you back in.  Let me know if you still have any issues afterward!
same with me, even though the servers are back up i cant login, i cleared my dns already
Ty it seems to have fixed itself though.

I've had this problem many times before. Clearing my DNS cache works 90% of the time. Directions here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944#wq8

Hope it helps!
